text:
It would be really handy when working intensively on a BeanShell Sampler or
Function to be able to run a Test Plan in a debug mode where you could have a
break point on a component or variable and then step through the test plan
and/or bring up a BeanShell Console within the current JMeter context with full
access to the environment.

This would very much speed up the development and debugging of BeanShell
Samplers and Functions.
